en: I played volleyball yesterday.

fa: یه خودکار خوبی داشتم، وقتی که دبیرستان بودم
en: I had a nice pen when I was in high school

fa: چهار سال پیش یه بی‌ام‌و داشتم
en: I had a BMW four years ago

fa: توی مهدکودک دو تا دوست داشتم
en: I had two friends in the kindergarten
I had a class yesterday

fa: تو هفته‌ی گذشته فیلم جدیدی تماشا کردی
en: You watched a new movie last week

fa: تو جلسه‌ی قبل عربی حرف زدی
en: You spoke Arabic in the previous session

fa: توی اون لحظه، تو پلیس رو خبر کردی
en: You called the police at that moment
Selena talked to her friend last night

fa: چند سال پیش، مامانم رامسر یه خونه داشت
en: My mother had a house in Ramsar a few years ago

fa: وقتی اونجا زندگی می‌کردیم، مامانم برامون نون تازه می‌پخت
en: My mother baked fresh bread for us, when we lived there

fa: اون پنج دقیقه پیش تختش رو مرتب کرد
en: She made her bed five minutes ago

fa: اون دو هفته پیش رفت پیش دندون‌پزشک‌ش
en: She visited her dentist two weeks ago

fa: «جو» دو روز پیش خونواده‌اش را دید
en: Joe saw his family two days ago

fa: زمانی که من هنوز به دنیا نیومده بودم، بابام توی روستا زندگی می‌کرد
en: My father lived in the village when I wasn’t born yet

fa: یکشنبه‌ی قبل، اون توی رودخونه شنا کرد
en: He swam in the river last Sunday
Our dog dove into the river

fa: تو که اینجا نبودی، برادرم با دوستش حرف زد
en: My brother talked to his friend, when you weren’t here
He came back home the night before
It (our dog) barked last night
It rained a lot last month
We lived in Paris in 1996
We finished our homework
We danced at the party
They went to Spain for their holidays
They opened the mall in the evening

fa: اونا دو هفته پیش رفتن عمان
en: They went to Oman two weeks ago
I didn’t play football yesterday
I didn’t have a class last week

fa: من وقتی دوازده سالم بود، دوچرخه‌ای نداشتم
en: I didn’t have a bicycle when I was 12

fa: من وقتی جوون بودم، خونه‌ نداشتم
en: I didn’t have a house when I was young

fa: من وقتی جوون بودم، زن نداشتم
en: I didn’t have a wife when I was young

fa: من وقتی اونجا کار می‌کردم، شوهر نداشتم
en: I didn’t have a husband when I worked there

fa: من وقتی اونجا کار می‌کردم، دو تا پسرهام رو نداشتم
en: I didn’t have my two sons when I worked there
I didn’t have a villa
I didn’t like fast food before
I didn’t believe you before
My father didn’t have a villa last year

fa: نامزدم وقتی باهاش آشنا شدم، ویلا نداشت
en: My fiancé didn’t have a villa when I met him
My children didn’t have a car last year
He didn’t go to the gym last month
He didn’t like Kebab
She didn’t arrive on time this morning

fa: مامانم این هفته یادش نرفت بره پیش دندون‌پزشکش
en: My mother didn’t forget to go to her dentist this week

fa: مامانم بلد نبود چه‌جوری نون بپزه
en: My mother didn’t know how to bake bread
Their secretary didn’t have a husband

fa: اون‌ها ماه گذشته به تئاتر نرفتند
en: They didn’t go to the theater last month
They did not see us, I’m sure!

fa: اون‌ها حتی یه کلمه هم حرف نزدن
en: They didn’t even say a word
Last winter, it didn’t snow in Isfahan
It didn’t rain last night
It (our dog) didn’t eat its food
Did you play football yesterday?
Did you have a class the day before yesterday?
Did you see me in the mall?
Did you know how to drive a car?
Did they lose the game?

fa: مامانت هم‌سن تو که بود، رانندگی می‌کرد؟
en: Did your mother drive when she was at your age?
Did she swim?
Did she walk in the yard?
Did she work in the hospital last year?
Did she like dancing?
Did she speak Turkish?

fa: دیروز صبح خواهرت سوار دوچرخه شد؟
en: Did your sister ride a bicycle last morning?
Did your sister have a house?
Did your friend come?
Did your colleague call?
Did your daughter sleep?
Did your dad buy you a present?

fa: اون آخر هفته‌ی گذشته خونه‌اش رو تمیز کرد؟
en: Did he clean his home last weekend?

fa: پسرت هفته‌ی پیش رو خوب درس خوند؟
en: Did your son study well last week?
Did your boyfriend dance with you?

fa: دوست منیژه، بهار، انگلیسی صحبت می‌کرد؟
en: Did Manije’s friend, Bahar, speak English?
Did your sister’s friend have a house?
Did your mom’s friend cook?
Did your husband’s colleague drive?
Did your sister’s daughter paint?
Did Bahar’s dad walk?
Did Parvin’s son work?
Did she have a husband?
Did your sister have any children?
Did your colleague have any brothers?
When?
When did you buy that sweater?
When did you study English?
When did she travel to Europe?

fa: چه ساعتی از خواب بلند شدی دیروز؟
en: What time did you get up yesterday?
When did you come back yesterday?
When did she travel to Europe?
Why?

fa: چرا بچه 2 ساعت پیش گریه کرد؟
en: Why did the baby cry 2 hours ago?

fa: چرا علی تند رانندگی می‌کرد وقتی مسافرت بودیم؟
en: Why did Ali drive fast when we went on a trip?
Why did you say that?
Why did you study French?
What?

fa: خواهرت دیشب برای شام چه چیزی درست کرد؟
en: What did your sister cook for dinner last night?
What did she have in her bag?
What did you eat last morning?
What did your brother do?
How?

fa: «تد» امروز صبح چطور (با چه وسیله‌ای) سر کار رفت؟
en: How did Ted get to work this morning?
How did you do that?
How did Zahra bake the cake?
How did you study yesterday?
Where?

fa: پدرت وقتی بچه بود کجا زندگی می‌کرد؟
en: Where did your father live when he was a child?

fa: پدر و مادرت کجا زندگی می‌کردن؟
en: Where did your parents live?
Where did you work?
I watched a horror movie last night.

fa: اون توی خونه آهنگ گوش میداد.
en: He listened to music at home.

fa: او سه ساعت پیش یه مقدار آب‌میوه خورد.
en: She drank some juice 3 hours ago.
They bought books last week.
Jack drove his own car.

fa: اون توی دانشگاه تهران درس میخوند.
en: He studied in Tehran university.
Sarah danced here.

fa: اون جمعه پیش سفر کرد کرمان.
en: He traveled to Kerman last Friday.
He slept last night for 8 hours.
He worked for 5 hours.
He drove a Porsche.
She worked in Tehran.

fa: او شش ساعت پیش به مادرش زنگ زد.
en: She called her mom six hours ago.
I invited 5 people.
He went to Karaj by bus.
He saw his uncle there.
He bought the gift on Monday.
Did your sister dance?
How long did your son cry?
Where did Ali live?
Where did he listen to music?
What did they buy yesterday?
What did she drink yesterday?
What did you do last night?
Who made noise in the street?
Who came here?
I did not like Chinese food.
He talked to his wife.
Where did Peter study French?

fa: اون دیروز با کی حرف زد؟
en: Who did he talk to yesterday?
Which TV series did she watch at nights?
Which color did you buy last time?
Whose food did you eat?

fa: سارا از لپ‌تاپ چه کسی استفاده کرد؟
en: Whose laptop did Sarah use?
Whose car did Jack drive?
Did you love him?
He came here by subway.
How did your dad go to Karaj?
Which tea did they drink?
He drove to gym.
How many people did you invite?
They bought a lot of sugar.

fa: توی آخرین وعده چقدر نمک مصرف کردی؟
en: How much salt did you use for last meal?

fa: چرا توی جمع اون حرف رو زد؟
en: Why did she say that in public?
How much food did they cook for lunch?
My brother fought at the club.

fa: من برای مرگش نتونستم گریه کنم.
en: I couldn’t cry for her death.
When did you learn to play the guitar?
When did your mother come back from the village?
Why didn’t you go to the party?
